title: Weapons Declaration
description: Walston customs requires declaration of all weapons. Law level 8 prohibits most firearms.
prompt: The customs officer scans your luggage and pauses. 'Weapons detected. Law level 8 applies here. You'll need to declare and check any firearms. Or you can try to talk your way through, but I wouldn't recommend it.'

declare_and_check.label: Declare weapons and check them at customs
declare_and_check.description: Cooperate with customs. Weapons stored safely, retrievable when departing.

attempt_concealment.label: Try to conceal weapons
attempt_concealment.description: Risky. Requires successful Stealth or Deception check.

weapons_checked.description: Weapons stored at customs. Claim ticket provided.
weapons_checked.narrator_text: The officer nods approvingly. 'Smart choice. Here's your claim ticket. Pick them up when you leave.' Your weapons are secured in a customs locker.

weapons_smuggled.narrator_text: The officer waves you through without noticing. Your weapons remain hidden, but one wrong move could expose them.

weapons_confiscated.description: Weapons seized. Fine assessed. Legal record noted.
weapons_confiscated.narrator_text: The officer's expression hardens. 'Attempted concealment. That's a 500 credit fine and confiscation.' Your weapons are seized permanently.
